      Modifier and Type Class and Description
      class  StackTypesValidator
      Checks if the locals and the operand stack will contain the correct types for each instruction in the BafBody.

      Modifier and Type Class and Description
      class  FieldRefValidator 
      class  IdentityStatementsValidator 
      class  IdentityValidator
      This BodyValidator checks whether each ParameterRef and ThisRef is used exactly once.
      class  InvokeArgumentValidator
      A basic BodyValidator that checks whether the length of the invoke statement's argument list matches the length of the target method's parameter type list.
      class  InvokeValidator 
      class  JimpleTrapValidator
      This validator checks whether the jimple traps are correct.
      class  MethodValidator 
      class  NewValidator
      A relatively simple validator.
      class  ReturnStatementsValidator
      Checks that this Body actually contains a throw or return statement, and that the return statement is of the appropriate type (i.e.
      class  TypesValidator
      Checks whether the types used for locals, method parameters, and method return values are allowed in final Jimple code.
